sys_atf_step.description: Log: Test of date that is set dynamically in step 2 to determine if the business rule is operating correctly. This should succeed for any date in the future. Record inserted (or attempted to insert) is: {{Step 2: Record Insert.Record}} for validation, user created in step one is: {{Step 1: Create a User.User}} and their email (to confirm it fall to an acceptable format) is {{Step 1: Create a User.User.Email}} and their role(s) : {{Step 1: Create a User.User.Roles}}

sys_variable_value.value: Test of date that is set dynamically in step 2 to determine if the business rule is operating correctly. This should succeed for any date in the future. Record inserted (or attempted to insert) is: {{step['bac97f451b3401107ae5c991604bcba0'].record_id}} for validation, user created in step one is: {{step['3ec97f451b3401107ae5c991604bcb98'].user}} and their email (to confirm it fall to an acceptable format) is {{step['3ec97f451b3401107ae5c991604bcb98'].user.email}} and their role(s) : {{step['3ec97f451b3401107ae5c991604bcb98'].user.roles}}
